reviewtext: Side was quite small for the 8x21 and cool, but the quality of the picture wasn't as good and crisp as I was expecting.I give it a 3 stars out of 5 because I thought it could have been better.I'll try some other to see if it worst than this, and if they worst, I'll boost this to 4 stars.
summary: Not as good as expect, but at least you can definitely see, but just aren't as crisp
